articles.title: Paige Bueckers Makes History with 44-Point Game in Wings Loss as Plum Keys Sparks Win - Bleacher Report
articles.description: Paige Bueckers poured in a season- and career-high 44 points—the most in the league this year and tied for 10th most all-time—but it wasn't enough, as the Dallas Wings narrowly fell to the Los Angeles Sparks, 81–80, on Wednesday in L.A., officially ending the…

articles.title: Urban Meyer thinks the NFL should suspend Jim Harbaugh - NBC Sports
articles.description: Meyer cites the precedent the league set with Jim Tressel.

articles.title: Cubs' Tucker told in June he had fracture in hand - ESPN
articles.description: Cubs outfielder Kyle Tucker, whose production at the plate has plummeted since July, was diagnosed in June with a hairline fracture in his hand.

articles.description: With Jauan Jennings, Jacob Cowing, Brandon Aiyuk, and Jordan Watkins all sidelined, the 49ers went looking for help at wide receiver and made a trade with the Chiefs.

articles.title: Report: Bullet fired into Reid's office in May '24 - ESPN
articles.description: A bullet penetrated the glass in the practice facility office of Andy Reid while the Chiefs coach was working alone in it last year, The Kansas City Star reported Wednesday night.

articles.title: Vikings trade defensive tackle Harrison Phillips to the Jets as roster cutdown day nears - Star Tribune
articles.description: The Vikings, loaded with young defensive linemen, received two sixth-round picks for Phillips, a team captain who started every game for them the past three seasons.

articles.title: It’s been over 20 years since a healthy Steelers’ starting quarterback skipped the preseason - NBC Sports
articles.description: When the Steelers face the Panthers for the 2025 preseason finale, starting quarterback Aaron Rodgers won't play.

articles.title: Seahawks ready for joint practice with Packers | Notebook - The Seattle Times
articles.description: While the Seahawks’ final preseason game is against the Packers, the last time many players may see live action comes in fields adjacent to legendary Lambeau Field.

articles.title: Brian Schottenheimer confident Micah Parsons will play Week 1 vs. Eagles - Dallas Cowboys
articles.description: Cowboys head coach Brian Schottenheimer said Wednesday that he's confident All-Pro pass rusher Micah Parsons will play in the team's Week 1 game against the Philadelphia Eagles.

articles.title: Broncos agree to terms on trade with Saints to acquire fourth-, seventh-round picks in exchange for WR Devaughn Vele - Denver Broncos
articles.description: Denver has agreed to terms on a trade with the Saints to acquire a 2026 fourth-round pick and 2027 seventh-round pick in exchange for wide receiver Devaughn Vele, the team announced Wednesday.

articles.description: Jake Paul vs. Gervonta "Tank" Davis is indeed real, for better or worse. What does that say about the state of boxing?

articles.description: The last practice of training camp featured a strong day from the defense, a ton of J.J. McCarthy reps, and a few injury concerns.

articles.title: Bryan Battle released from UFC after second weight miss, fight cancellation at UFC 319 - MMA Fighting
articles.description: Bryan Battle has been released from his UFC contract after missing weight for the second time in a row with his latest fight being cancelled from UFC 319

articles.description: The Fever guard reportedly added another ailment to her groin injury.

articles.title: Controversial Olympic skier Eileen Gu in ‘very terrible’ accident while training - New York Post
articles.description: American freestyle skiing star Eileen Gu said she was injured in a “very terrible accident” Friday while training in New Zealand, according to the South China Morning Post.
